queryString.qstring: select * from tf_f_shopping_cart where user_id=:VUSER_ID group by trade_id
select * from tf_f_shopping_cart where user_id=:VUSER_ID and sale_id=:VSALE_ID
select * from tf_f_shopping_cart where trade_id=:VTRADE_ID

insert into tf_f_shopping_cart (cust_id,trade_id,sale_id,price,num,discount,user_id,oper_date,oper_user_id,in_date,remark) values (:VCUST_ID,:VTRADE_ID,:VSALE_ID,:VPRICE,:VNUM,:VDISCOUNT,:VUSER_ID,now(),:VOPER_USER_ID,now(),:VREMARK)
update tf_f_shopping_cart set price=:VPRICE,num=:VNUM,discount=:VDISCOUNT,oper_date=now(),oper_user_id=:VOPER_USER_ID,in_date=now(),remark=:VREMARK where trade_id=:VTRADE_ID
delete from tf_f_shopping_cart where trade_id=:VTRADE_ID
update tf_f_shopping_cart set num=:VNUM where trade_id=:VTRADE_ID
select * from lmxxb where lmjb=:VLMJB and lmbs in (select menu_id from rightinfo where staff_id=:VSTAFFID and right_attr='1' and end_date>=now()) order by xssx
select * from lmxxb where lmjb=:VLMJB order by xssx
select * from lmxxb where lmjb=:VLMJB and sjlmbs=:VSJLMBS order by xssx
select * from lmxxb where lmbs=:VLMBS
insert into lmxxb values (:VLMBS,:VLMJB,:VLMMC,:VMBWJM,:VMBWJLJ,:VSJLMBS,:VXSSX,now(),:VCZYGH,:VBZ)
update lmxxb set lmmc=:VLMMC,mbwjm=:VMBWJM,mbwjlj=:VMBWJLJ,xssx=:VXSSX,bz=:VBZ where lmbs=:VLMBS
update lmxxb set lmmc=:VLMMC,xssx=:VXSSX,bz=:VBZ where lmbs=:VLMBS
select * from staffinfo where staff_id=:VSTAFFID

query.table:
tf_f_fee_normal
INS_FEE_NORMAL insert into tf_f_fee_normal(cust_id,fee_id,form_id,quo_id,staff_id,currency,in_out_type,fee_desc,fee_remark,fee_account,fact_fee,in_date) values (:VCUST_ID,:VFEE_ID,:VFORM_ID,:VQUO_ID,:VSTAFF_ID,:VCURRENCY,:VIN_OUT_TYPE,:VFEE_DESC,:VFEE_REMARK,:VFEE_ACCOUNT,:VFACT_FEE,now()) SEL_ONE_FEE_NORMAL
SEL_FEE_NORMAL_BY_CUST_ID select* from tf_f_fee_normal where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
SEL_ONE_FEE_NORMAL select* from tf_f_fee_normal where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and form_id=:VFORM_ID

queryString.qstring: insert into tf_f_fee_project(cust_id,fee_id,fee_pro_id,pro_fee,pro_name,remark) values (:VCUST_ID,:VFEE_ID,:VFEE_PRO_ID,:VPRO_FEE,:VPRO_NAME,:VREMARK)
select * from tradetype where trade_type_code = :VTRADETYPECODE
select * from tf_f_commodity order by publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_cust_group
select * from tf_f_stockorder order by publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_product order by publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_bidding order by publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_sale order by publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_cust_group a ,tf_f_sale b where a.cust_id = b.sale_unit and b.sale_unit=:VSALE_UNIT order by b.publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_bidding a,tf_f_cust_group b where a.cust_id=b.cust_id and a.cust_id=:VCUST_ID order by a.publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_product a,tf_f_cust_group b where a.cust_id=b.cust_id and a.cust_id=:VCUST_ID order by a.publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_stockorder a,tf_f_cust_group b where a.cust_id = b.cust_id and a.cust_id=:VCUST_ID order by a.publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_commodity a,tf_f_cust_group b where a.cust_id = b.cust_id and a.cust_id=:VCUST_ID order by a.publish_date desc
select * from bpmdefinition where trade_type_code=:VTRADETYPECODE order by node_sequence desc
select * from bpmdefinition where trade_type_code=:VTRADETYPECODE and rsrv_str6=:VRSRV_STR6 order by node_sequence desc
select * from menuinfo where menu_id not in (select link_menu_id from td_b_linkmenu where menu_id=:VMENU_ID) and menu_class='3' and subsys_code!='B2B' and subsys_code!='COM' order by subsys_code asc
select menu_id,menu_name,subsys_code from menuinfo where menu_class='3' order by subsys_code desc
select * from menuinfo where subsys_code=:VSUBSYS_CODE and menu_class='1'
select * from menuinfo where up_menu_id=:VUP_MENU_ID
select * from menuinfo where up_menu_id=:VUP_MENU_ID and menu_id not in (select link_menu_id from td_b_linkmenu where menu_id=:VMENU_ID)
select * from menuinfo where menu_id=:VMENU_ID
select * from menuinfo where subsys_code =:VSUBSYS_CODE and menu_class =:VMENU_CLASS and menu_id in (select t.menu_id from rightinfo t where t.cust_class =:VCUST_CLASS and t.end_date >now())
select * from menuinfo where subsys_code =:VSUBSYS_CODE and menu_class =:VMENU_CLASS
select menu_id,menu_name,menu_class,up_menu_id from menuinfo where subsys_code =:VSUBSYS_CODE and menu_class =:VMENU_CLASS
select menu_id,menu_name from menuinfo where subsys_code =:VSUBSYS_CODE and menu_class =:VMENU_CLASS and menu_id in(select menu_id from rightinfo where cust_class=:VCUST_CLASS)
select * from menuinfo where subsys_code =:VSUBSYS_CODE and up_menu_id =:VMENU_ID
select * from menuinfo where menu_class=:VMENU_CLASS and subsys_code in ('OA','CRM','CTR','HELP')
select * from menuinfo where up_menu_id= :VUP_MENU_ID and subsys_code in ('OA','CRM','CTR','HELP')
select * from menuinfo where ((menu_id in (select menu_id from rightinfo where cust_class=:VCUST_CLASS )) or ('admin'=:VSTAFFID)) and menu_class=:VCLASS order by subsys_code desc, in_date

select * from menuinfo where ((menu_id in (select menu_id from rightinfo where cust_class=:VUSER_CLASS and '0'=:VUSER_TYPE)) or ('admin'=:VSTAFFID) or (''= :VSTAFF_ID) or (menu_id in (select menu_id from td_b_roleright where role_code=:VROLE_CODE))) and menu_class=:VCLASS and subsys_code=:VSUBSYS_CODE order by abs(rsrv_str0)

select * from menuinfo where ((menu_id in (select menu_id from rightinfo where cust_class=:VCUST_CLASS and '0'=:VUSER_TYPE)) or ('admin'=:VSTAFFID) or menu_id in (select menu_id from td_b_roleright where role_code=:VROLE_CODE)) and menu_class=:VCLASS and up_menu_id=:VUP_ITEM_ID order by in_date
select * from menuinfo where subsys_code=:VSERVER_ID and up_menu_id=:VUP_MENU_ID
select menu_id,menu_name from menuinfo where subsys_code=:VSUBSYS_CODE and up_menu_id=:VMENU_ID and menu_id in(select t.menu_id from rightinfo t where t.cust_class =:VCUST_CLASS and t.end_date>now())
select t.menu_id,t.menu_name from menuinfo t,td_b_roleright r where t.menu_id=r.menu_id and r.menu_id=:VMENU_ID and r.cust_id=:VCUST_ID and r.role_code=:VROLE_CODE
select * from moduleinfo where module_id=:VMODULE_ID

insert into moduleinfo ( MODULE_ID, MODULE_NAME, MODULE_FILE, MODULE_DIR, MODULE_TYPE, RSRV_STR1, RSRV_STR2, RSRV_STR3, RSRV_STR4, RSRV_STR5, RSRV_STR6, RSRV_STR7, RSRV_STR8, RSRV_STR9, RSRV_STR0, IN_STAFF_ID, IN_DATE, REMARK) values( :VMODULE_ID,:VMODULE_NAME,:VMODULE_FILE,:VMODULE_DIR,:VMODULE_TYPE,:VRSRV_STR1,:VRSRV_STR2,:VRSRV_STR3,:VRSRV_STR4,:VRSRV_STR5,:VRSRV_STR6,:VRSRV_STR7,:VRSRV_STR8,:VRSRV_STR9,:VRSRV_STR0,:VIN_STAFF_ID,now(),:VREMARK )
select a.* from tf_f_customer a, tf_f_user c where a.cust_id=c.cust_id and a.cust_state=:VCUST_STATE and c.user_name!='admin' order by a.cust_id
select count(*) as ct from tf_f_customer a, tf_f_user c where a.cust_id=c.cust_id and a.cust_state=:VCUST_STATE and c.user_name!='admin' order by a.cust_id
select a.* from tf_f_customer a, tf_f_user c where a.cust_id=c.cust_id and a.cust_state=:VCUST_STATE and c.user_name!='admin' and a.cust_name like :VKEY order by a.cust_id
select count(*) as ct from tf_f_customer a, tf_f_user c where a.cust_id=c.cust_id and a.cust_state=:VCUST_STATE and c.user_name!='admin' and a.cust_name like :VKEY order by a.cust_id
select b.qq,b.contact_name,b.sex,a.* from tf_f_customer a,tf_f_user_detail b where a.cust_id=b.cust_id and a.cust_id=:VCUST_ID

select b.class_name,a.cust_id,a.cust_name from tf_f_customer a , tf_b_infoclass b ,tf_f_cust_level c where a.cust_id = b.root_id and a.cust_id=c.cust_id and c.cust_end_date>now() and c.cust_class='6' GROUP by a.publish_date desc

select b.class_name,a.cust_id,a.company_address,a.cust_name from tf_f_customer a , tf_b_infoclass b ,tf_f_cust_level c where a.cust_id = b.root_id and a.cust_id=c.cust_id and c.cust_end_date>now() and a.cust_id not in (select cust_id from tf_f_cust_person) GROUP by a.publish_date desc

select t.*,s.cust_class from tf_f_v_customer t,tf_f_v_cust_class s where t.cust_id=s.cust_id and t.cust_id in(select root_id from tf_b_infoclass where instr(class_id_grp, :VGROUP_ID ) >0) and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or t.eparchy_code like :VCITY or t.province like :VPROV ) order by s.cust_class desc

select count(*) as ct from tf_f_v_customer t,tf_f_v_cust_class s where t.cust_id=s.cust_id and t.cust_id in(select root_id from tf_b_infoclass where instr(class_id_grp, :VGROUP_ID ) >0) and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or t.eparchy_code like :VCITY or t.province like :VPROV ) order by s.cust_class desc

select t.*,s.cust_class from tf_f_v_customer t,tf_f_v_cust_class s where t.cust_id=s.cust_id and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or t.eparchy_code like :VCITY or t.province like :VPROV ) order by s.cust_class desc

select count(*) as ct from tf_f_v_customer t,tf_f_v_cust_class s where t.cust_id=s.cust_id and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or t.eparchy_code like :VCITY or t.province like :VPROV ) order by s.cust_class desc

select c.para_code2,a.cust_name,a.cust_id from tf_f_customer a,tf_f_cust_level b,td_s_commpara c where a.cust_id=b.cust_id and b.cust_class=c.para_code1 and c.param_attr='14' and b.cust_end_date>now() group by a.cust_id order by b.cust_class desc LIMIT 10
select a.cust_name,b.cust_class from tf_f_customer a,tf_f_cust_level b where a.cust_id=b.cust_id and a.cust_id=:VCUST_ID group by a.cust_id

select c.para_code2,a.cust_name,a.cust_id from tf_f_customer a,tf_f_cust_level b,td_s_commpara c where a.cust_id=b.cust_id and b.cust_class=c.para_code1 and c.param_attr='14' and b.cust_end_date>now() group by a.cust_id order by b.cust_class desc LIMIT 10

select t.*,c.update_time,c.start_date from tf_f_customer t,tf_f_relation_cc c where c.obj_cust_id=t.cust_id and c.relation_type_code=:VRELATION_TYPE_CODE and c.cust_id=:VCUST_ID order by update_time desc limit 0,5

select c.obj_cust_id,f.cust_id,f.cust_name,f.email,f.group_contact_phone,b.level_name from tf_f_customer f,tf_f_relation_cc c,td_b_level b where c.relation_type_code='2' and c.rela_class=:VRELA_CLASS and c.cust_id=:VCUST_ID and f.cust_id =c.obj_cust_id and c.rela_class=b.level_code

select f.cust_id as obj_cust_id,f.cust_name,f.group_contact_phone,f.email from tf_f_customer f where f.cust_id in(select distinct(s.entity_id) from tf_b_entclass s,tf_f_relation_cc c where s.entity_type ='2' and class_id !=:VRELA_CLASS and s.cust_id=c.cust_id and c.cust_id =:VCUST_ID)

select t.cust_id,t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.email from tf_f_customer t where exists (select * from tf_f_relation_cc d where d.cust_id = :VCUST_ID and d.obj_cust_id=t.cust_id ) and exists (select '1' from tf_b_entclass s where s.entity_type=:VENTITY_TYPE and s.class_id = :VCLASS_ID and s.cust_id = :VCUST_ID and s.entity_id=t.cust_id)

select t.cust_id,t.cust_name from tf_f_customer t where exists (select * from tf_f_relation_cc d where d.cust_id = :VCUST_ID and d.obj_cust_id=t.cust_id ) and not exists (select '1' from tf_b_entclass s where s.entity_type=:VENTITY_TYPE and s.class_id = :VCLASS_ID and s.cust_id = :VCUST_ID and s.entity_id=t.cust_id)

insert into tf_f_customer(CUST_ID,CUST_NAME,CUST_TYPE,CUST_STATE,PSPT_TYPE_CODE,PSPT_ID,PSPT_ADDR,EPARCHY_CODE,CITY_CODE,DEVELOPE_CHANNEL,DEVELOPE_MAN,CLASS_ID,GROUP_ATTR,CLIENT_STATUS,USER_COUNT,COMPANY_ADDRESS,POST_CODE,WEBSITE,FAX_NBR,EMAIL,GROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,ENTERPRISE_SCOPE,PROVINCE,CITY,CALLING_TYPE_CODE,CALLING_AREA_CODE,ENTERPRISE_TYPE_CODE,ENTERPRISE_SIZE_CODE,JURISTIC_CUST_ID,JURISTIC,JURISTIC_TYPE_CODE,ALL_EMP_COUNT,CHINA_EMP_COUNT,LOCAL_EMP_COUNT,CUST_AIM,GROUP_MEMO,SCOPE,REG_MONEY) values (:VCUST_ID,:VCUST_NAME,'0','0',:VPSPT_TYPE_CODE,:VPSPT_ID,:VPSPT_ADDR, :VEPARCHY_CODE,:VCITY_CODE,:VDEVELOPE_CHANNEL,:VDEVELOPE_MAN,:VCLASS_ID,:VGROUP_ATTR,:VCLIENT_STATUS,TO_NUMBER(:VUSER_COUNT),:VCOMPANY_ADDRESS, :VPOST_CODE,:VWEBSITE,:VFAX_NBR,:VEMAIL,:VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,:VENTERPRISE_SCOPE,:VPROVINCE,:VCITY,:VCALLING_TYPE_CODE,:VCALLING_AREA_CODE,:VENTERPRISE_TYPE_CODE,:VENTERPRISE_SIZE_CODE,'0',:VJURISTIC,:VJURISTIC_TYPE_CODE,TO_NUMBER(:VALL_EMP_COUNT),TO_NUMBER(:VCHINA_EMP_COUNT),TO_NUMBER(:VLOCAL_EMP_COUNT),:VCUST_AIM,:VGROUP_MEMO,:VSCOPE,:VREG_MONEY)

select t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.email,c.obj_cust_id from tf_f_customer t,tf_f_relation_cc c where t.cust_id=c.obj_cust_id and c.relation_type_code='1' and c.end_date > now() and c.cust_id=:VCUST_ID and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or replace( :VCUST_NAME,'%','') ='') and (t.group_contact_phone like :VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE or replace(:VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,'%','') ='') and (t.province like :VPROVINCE or replace(:VPROVINCE,'%','') ='') and (t.eparchy_code like :VEPARCHY_CODE or replace(:VEPARCHY_CODE,'%','') ='') and (t.city_code like :VCITY_CODE or replace(:VCITY_CODE,'%','') ='')

select * from tf_f_customer t,tf_f_relation_cc c where t.cust_id=c.obj_cust_id and c.cust_id=:VCUST_ID and c.relation_type_code = '2' and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or replace( :VCUST_NAME,'%','') ='') and (t.group_contact_phone like :VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE or replace(:VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,'%','') ='') and (t.province like :VPROVINCE or replace(:VPROVINCE,'%','') ='') and (t.eparchy_code like :VEPARCHY_CODE or replace(:VEPARCHY_CODE,'%','') ='') and (t.city_code like :VCITY_CODE or replace(:VCITY_CODE,'%','') ='')

select count(*) as tt from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in (select distinct(obj_cust_id) from tf_f_relation_cc where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and relation_type_code = '2') and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or replace( :VCUST_NAME,'%','') ='') and (t.group_contact_phone like :VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE or replace(:VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,'%','') ='') and (t.province like :VPROVINCE or replace(:VPROVINCE,'%','') ='') and (t.eparchy_code like :VEPARCHY_CODE or replace(:VEPARCHY_CODE,'%','') ='') and (t.city_code like :VCITY_CODE or replace(:VCITY_CODE,'%','') ='')

select count(*) as tt from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in (select distinct(obj_cust_id) from tf_f_relation_cc where cust_id=:VCUST_ID ) and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or replace( :VCUST_NAME,'%','') ='') and (t.group_contact_phone like :VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE or replace(:VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,'%','') ='') and (t.province like :VPROVINCE or replace(:VPROVINCE,'%','') ='') and (t.eparchy_code like :VEPARCHY_CODE or replace(:VEPARCHY_CODE,'%','') ='') and (t.city_code like :VCITY_CODE or replace(:VCITY_CODE,'%','') ='')

select count(*) as tt from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in (select distinct(obj_cust_id) from tf_f_relation_cc where cust_id=:VCUST_ID ) and (t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME or replace( :VCUST_NAME,'%','') ='') and (t.group_contact_phone like :VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE or replace(:VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,'%','') ='') and (t.province like :VPROVINCE or replace(:VPROVINCE,'%','') ='') and (t.eparchy_code like :VEPARCHY_CODE or replace(:VEPARCHY_CODE,'%','') ='') and (t.city_code like :VCITY_CODE or replace(:VCITY_CODE,'%','') ='')

select t.cust_name,t.cust_id,t.group_contact_phone,t.email from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in(select c.obj_cust_id from tf_f_relation_cc c,tf_b_infoclass i where c.cust_id= :VCUST_ID and i.root_id=c.obj_cust_id and instr(i.class_id_grp,:VCLASS_ID ) >0)

select count(*) as rr from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in(select c.obj_cust_id from tf_f_relation_cc c,tf_b_infoclass i where c.cust_id= :VCUST_ID and i.root_id=c.obj_cust_id and instr(i.class_id_grp,:VCLASS_ID ) >0)

select t.cust_name,t.cust_id,t.group_contact_phone,t.email from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in(select c.obj_cust_id from tf_f_relation_cc c,tf_b_infoclass i where c.cust_id= :VCUST_ID and c.relation_type_code = '2' and i.root_id=c.obj_cust_id and instr(i.class_id_grp,:VCLASS_ID ) >0)

select count(*) as rr from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in(select c.obj_cust_id from tf_f_relation_cc c,tf_b_infoclass i where c.cust_id= :VCUST_ID and c.relation_type_code = '2' and i.root_id=c.obj_cust_id and instr(i.class_id_grp,:VCLASS_ID ) >0)
select t.* from tf_f_customer t where t.calling_type_code = :VCALLINGTYPE and t.cust_id in(select f.obj_cust_id from tf_f_relation_cc f where f.cust_id =:VCUST_ID)

insert into tf_f_customer (cust_id,cust_state,scope,cust_aim,group_memo,calling_type_code,company_address,cust_name,eparchy_code,fax_nbr,group_contact_phone,juristic,pspt_addr,pspt_id,pspt_type_code,user_count,website,develope_channel,develope_man,province,publish_date,email,city,city_code) values (:VCUST_ID,:VCUST_STATE,:VSCOPE,:VCUST_AIM,:VGROUP_MEMO,:VCALLING_TYPE_CODE,:VCOMPANY_ADDRESS,:VCUST_NAME,:VEPARCHY_CODE,:VFAX_NBR,:VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,:VJURISTIC,:VPSPT_ADDR,:VPSPT_ID,:VPSPT_TYPE_CODE,:VUSER_COUNT,:VWEBSITE,:VDEVELOPE_CHANNEL,:VDEVELOPE_MAN,:VPROVINCE,NOW(),:VEMAIL,:VCITY,:VCITY_CODE)
update tf_f_customer set cust_type=:VCUST_TYPE where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
select t.* from tf_f_customer t, tf_f_job f where f.job_unit=t.cust_id and validity !='3' group by f.job_unit
select * from tf_f_customer order by PUBLISH_DATE desc
select c.cust_id,c.cust_name,f.cust_class from tf_f_customer c, tf_f_cust_level f where c.cust_id=f.cust_id order by f.cust_id,f.cust_class desc
select t.cust_id,t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.email,t.fax_nbr from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id =:VCUST_ID order by PUBLISH_DATE desc
select * from tf_f_customer where develope_man=:VDEVELOPE_MAN and cust_state='0' order by PUBLISH_DATE desc
select * from tf_f_customer where develope_channel=:VDEVELOPE_CHANNEL order by PUBLISH_DATE desc
select count(*) as ct from tf_f_customer where cust_name =:VCUST_NAME order by PUBLISH_DATE desc
select * from tf_f_customer where cust_name like :VCONTENT

update tf_f_customer set cust_aim=:VCUST_AIM,fax_nbr=:VFAX_NBR,group_contact_phone=:VGROUP_CONTACT_PHONE,company_address=:VCOMPANY_ADDRESS,juristic=:VJURISTIC,group_memo=:VGROUP_MEMO,scope=:VSCOPE ,website = :VWEBSITE, user_count =:VUSER_COUNT,province= :VPROVINCE,eparchy_code=:VEPARCHY_CODE where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
select count(*) as root_id from tf_f_customer where cust_state=:VCUST_STATE order by PUBLISH_DATE desc

select t.cust_id,t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.company_address,f.title from tf_f_customer t,tf_f_sale f where t.cust_id=f.sale_unit and f.end_date >=now() and t.cust_name like :VCUST_NAME group by t.cust_id
select * from tf_f_customer where cust_state=:VCUST_STATE order by publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_customer where cust_state=:VCUST_STATE and cust_name like :VCUST_NAME order by publish_date desc
select * from tf_f_customer where cust_state=:VCUST_STATE and (publish_date between :VSTART_DATE and :VEND_DATE) order by publish_date desc

select t.cust_id,t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.company_address from tf_f_customer t,tf_f_cust_level f where t.cust_state=:VCUST_STATE and t.cust_id = f.cust_id and f.cust_class = :VCUST_CLASS order by t.publish_date desc
select count(*) as ct from tf_f_customer where cust_state=:VCUST_STATE
select * from tf_f_customer where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
select * from tf_f_customer where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
select * from tf_f_customer
update tf_f_customer set cust_state=:VCUST_STATE where cust_id=:VCUST_ID

select * from tf_f_customer f , tf_f_cust_level c where f.cust_id = c.cust_id and f.cust_id not in ( select cust_id from tf_f_cust_person )and f.cust_state='0' and f.cust_id in( select cust_id from tf_f_v_cust_class where cust_class > 1 ) group by f.cust_id order by c.cust_class,f.publish_date desc

select count(*) ct from tf_f_user t,tf_f_user_detail f,tf_f_relation_uu u,tf_f_customer c where t.cust_id = c.cust_id and t.user_id=f.user_id and t.user_id = u.user_id_a and u.user_id_b =:VUSER_ID and u.role_code_b =:VROLE_CODE_B and u.end_date >= now() order by u.start_date desc

insert into tf_b_group(cust_id,own_id,group_type,class_id,class_name,class_id_grp,class_name_grp,user_id,oper_user_id,in_date) values(:VCUST_ID,:VOWN_ID,:VGROUP_TYPE,:VCLASS_ID,:VCLASS_NAME,:VCLASS_ID_GRP,:VCLASS_NAME_GRP,:VUSER_ID,:VOPER_USER_ID,now())

select t.cust_id,t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.email,t.fax_nbr from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in(select distinct(user_id) from tf_b_group where group_type =:VGROUP_TYPE and cust_id =:VCUST_ID and class_id =:VCLASS_ID) group by t.cust_id

select count(*) as ct from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in(select distinct(user_id) from tf_b_group where group_type =:VGROUP_TYPE and cust_id =:VCUST_ID and class_id =:VCLASS_ID) group by t.cust_id

select t.cust_id,t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.email,t.fax_nbr from tf_f_customer t ,tf_b_entclass f where t.cust_id = f.entity_id and instr(f.class_id_grp,:VCLASS_ID ) >0 and f.entity_type =:VGROUP_TYPE and f.cust_id =:VCUST_ID group by entity_id

select t.cust_id,t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.email,t.fax_nbr from tf_f_customer t ,tf_b_entclass f where t.cust_id = f.entity_id and instr(f.class_id_grp,:VCLASS_ID ) = 0 and f.entity_type =:VGROUP_TYPE and f.cust_id =:VCUST_ID group by entity_id

select t.cust_id,t.cust_name,t.group_contact_phone,t.email,t.fax_nbr from tf_f_customer t where t.cust_id in (select f.cust_id from tf_f_user f,tf_f_relation_uu u where f.user_id=u.user_id_a and u.relation_type_code =:VRELATION_TYPE_CODE and u.user_id_b =:VUSER_ID and u.role_code_b='1')

select distinct(f.cust_id) as cust_id from tf_f_user f,tf_f_relation_uu u where f.user_id=u.user_id_a and u.relation_type_code =:VRELATION_TYPE_CODE and u.user_id_b =:VUSER_ID and u.role_code_b='1' and f.cust_id not in(select distinct(user_id) from tf_b_group where group_type =:VGROUP_TYPE and cust_id =:VCUST_ID and class_id =:VCLASS_ID)
select * from tf_b_group where class_id =:VCLASS_ID
delete from tf_b_group where class_id =:VCLASS_ID and cust_id =:VCUST_ID and group_type =:VGROUP_TYPE and own_id =:VOWN_ID and user_id =:VUSER_ID

update tf_f_warehouse set pos_num=pos_num-1,capacity=capacity-:VCAPACITY,area_no=area_no-:VPOS_AREA where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and house_id=:VHOUSE_ID

update tf_f_warehouse set capacity=capacity-:VCAPACITY,area_no=area_no-(:VPOS_AREA-:VPOS_AREA1)where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and house_id=:VHOUSE_ID

select * from tf_f_book where book_title=:VBOOK_KEY
select * from tf_f_book where book_author=:VBOOK_KEY
select * from tf_f_book where publisher=:VBOOK_KEY

insert into tf_f_shopping_order (cust_id,trade_id,sale_id,discount,order_type,price,num,money,user_id,deliver_type,pay_type,phone,cellphone,addr,consignee,province,eparchy_code,city,post_code,oper_date,carriage_pay,sum_money,oper_user_id,in_date,remark) values (:VCUST_ID,:VTRADE_ID,:VSALE_ID,:VDISCOUNT,:VORDER_TYPE,:VPRICE,:VNUM,:VMONEY,:VUSER_ID,:VDELIVER_TYPE,:VPAY_TYPE,:VPHONE,:VCELLPHONE,:VADDR,:VCONSIGNEE,:VPROVINCE,:VEPARCHY_CODE,:VCITY,:VPOST_CODE,now(),:VCARRIAGE_PAY,:VSUM_MONEY,:VOPER_USER_ID,now(),:VREMARK)
select * from tf_f_shopping_order where user_id=:VUSER_ID order by oper_date desc
select * from tf_f_shopping_order where cust_id=:VCUST_ID order by oper_date desc
select * from tf_f_shopping_order where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and ( oper_date >= :VSTART_DATE and oper_date < now() )
select * from tf_f_shopping_order where trade_id=:VTRADE_ID
select sum(num) as num,sale_id from tf_f_shopping_order where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and (oper_date >= :VSTART_DATE AND oper_date < :VEND_DATE) group by sale_id
select * from tf_f_shopping_order where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
update tf_f_shopping_order set carriage_pay=:VCARRIAGE_PAY,oper_user_id=:VOPER_USER_ID,in_date=now() where trade_id=:VTRADE_ID
update tf_f_shopping_order set order_type=:VORDER_TYPE,oper_user_id=:VOPER_USER_ID,in_date=now() where trade_id=:VTRADE_ID

insert into tf_f_last_oil_price (cust_id ,commerce_id ,commerce_name ,get_date ,last_price ,ud_type ,ud_price ,publish_user_id ,publish_date ,remark ) values (:VCUST_ID ,:VCOMMERCE_ID ,:VCOMMERCE_NAME ,:VGET_DATE ,:VLAST_PRICE ,:VUD_TYPE ,:VUD_PRICE ,:VPUBLISH_USER_ID ,NOW() ,:VREMARK)
select * from tf_f_last_oil_price where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
select count(*)as ct from tf_f_last_oil_price where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
select * from tf_f_last_oil_price
delete from tf_f_last_oil_price where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and commerce_id=:VCOMMERCE_ID
select * from tf_f_last_oil_price where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and commerce_id=:VCOMMERCE_ID

update tf_f_last_oil_price set commerce_name=:VCOMMERCE_NAME,get_date=:VGET_DATE,last_price=:VLAST_PRICE,ud_type=:VUD_TYPE,ud_price=:VUD_PRICE,publish_user_id=:VPUBLISH_USER_ID,remark=:VREMARK where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and commerce_id=:VCOMMERCE_ID

insert into tf_f_dis_test(dis_test_id,test_cust_name,product_name,contact_type,in_date,test_request,publish_date)values(:VDIS_TEST_ID,:VTEST_CUST_NAME,:VPRODUCT_NAME,:VCONTACT_TYPE,:VIN_DATE,:VTEST_REQUEST,:VPUBLISH_DATE)
update tf_f_dis_test set test_cust_name=:VTEST_CUST_NAME,product_name=:VPRODUCT_NAME,contact_type=:VCONTACT_TYPE,in_date=:VIN_DATE,test_request=:VTEST_REQUEST where dis_test_id=:VDIS_TEST_ID
select * from tf_f_dis_test
select * from tf_f_dis_test where dis_test_id=:VDIS_TEST_ID
delete from tf_f_dis_test where dis_test_id=:VDIS_TEST_ID

insert into tf_f_oil_point(cust_id,point_id,point_name,start_date,end_date,now_num,ud_type,ud_num,publish_user_id,publish_date,remark) values (:VCUST_ID,:VPOINT_ID,:VPOINT_NAME,:VSTART_DATE,:VEND_DATE,:VNOW_NUM,:VUD_TYPE,:VUD_NUM,:VPUBLISH_USER_ID,now(),:VREMARK)
select * from tf_f_oil_point where cust_id=:VCUST_ID group by publish_date desc
select count(*)as ct from tf_f_oil_point where cust_id=:VCUST_ID
select * from tf_f_oil_point where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and point_id=:VPOINT_ID
delete from tf_f_oil_point where cust_id=:VCUST_ID and point_id=:VPOINT_ID

update tf_f_oil_point set point_name =:VPOINT_NAME ,start_date =:VSTART_DATE ,end_date =:VEND_DATE ,now_num =:VNOW_NUM ,ud_type =:VUD_TYPE ,ud_num =:VUD_NUM ,publish_user_id =:VPUBLISH_USER_ID ,remark =:VREMARK where cust_id =:VCUST_ID and point_id =:VPOINT_ID
select * from tf_f_oil_point
